long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Facebook and Twitter Cookie Receiver Extension
Overview
This extension allows the user to collect certain cookie information associated with their Facebook and Twitter accounts so that they can be easily copied. The user can retrieve cookies and quickly copy this information through the extension's popup interface.

Features
Facebook Cookies:

Facebook User ID (c_user)
Facebook Session (xs)
Twitter Cookies:

Twitter CSRF Token (ct0)
Twitter Auth Token (auth_token)
Copy Function:

Users can easily copy cookie information using copy buttons.

Click on the extension icon.
Click the "Get Cookies" button in the popup window that opens.
View the cookie information shown in the popup.
Copy the information by clicking on the copy icon next to the cookie information.
